mean_cn: adj. 超越国界的，跨国的
mean_en: reaching beyond or transcending national boundaries; relating to or involving several nations or nationalities
word_etyma: trans跨越 + national国家的 → transnational 跨国的
sentence: Music crosses transnational boundaries; the language of the lyrics isn't so important.
sentence_trans: 音乐本身是超越国界的，歌词是什么语言并不重要。
